display_name: Coddington Life Events Questionnaire (PARENT): There has been a downward change in the familyÕs financial status during the past year
description:
Item from the Coddington Life Events Questionnaire (CLES), a self-report measure that helps determine how specific events have affected a childÕs personal growth and adjustment. [Coddington. (PMID: 5072914)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/5072914/)

[Search for all CLES variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=cles)
